name: Pasta With Spicy Sausages, Tomatoes, Rosemary and Olives
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound hot Italian sausage, casings removed
1 1/2 pounds ripe plum tomatoes, trimmed and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sausage and rosemary; cook, breaking up the meat with a fork, until browned and cooked through, 5 to 7 minutes. Add the garlic, cook 1 minute. Add the tomatoes and stir occasionally until they have broken down and turned into a sauce, 10 to 15 minutes. Stir in the olives for the last 5 minutes of cooking. Add salt to taste, cover and keep warm.
Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package directions. Drain well and toss with the sauce.
